snippet: Physicists weigh in on a passage in Mr. Suri’s novel “The City of Devi,” which won Literary Review’s annual Bad Sex in Fiction Award.
abstract: Physicists weigh in on a passage in Mr. Suri’s novel “The City of Devi,” which won Literary Review’s annual Bad Sex in Fiction Award.

headline.main: A Supernova of Bad Sex? Manil Suri Wins Uncoveted Award
